bug.author: amirebrahimi
bug.summary: Netron continuing to execute after closing; Shows up in task manager
bug.description:
Doesn't happen consistently, but it does happen. It may be one of the child processes that get spawned?
Netron app and version: Desktop app 4.5.1
Steps to Reproduce:
Open a model in netron by double clicking Close the model Notice netron is still running in task manager
Please attach or link model files to reproduce the issue if necessary. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/904110/93276376-2fe49d00-f774-11ea-893f-184588d06679.png></denchmark-link>
